mapper.insert: INSERT INTO petsitter( petsitter_no, member_id, petsitter_nick, petsitter_career, career_info, available_day, available_time, sitter_checklist, sitter_checklist_two, sitter_checklist_three, sitter_checklist_four, sitter_checklist_five, sitter_checklist_six, photo, sitter_accept, petsitter_email ) VALUES ( PETSITTER_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{petsitter_nick}, #{petsitter_career}, #{career_info}, #{available_time}, #{sitter_checklist}, #{sitter_checklist_two}, #{sitter_checklist_three}, #{sitter_checklist_four}, #{sitter_checklist_five}, #{sitter_checklist_six}, #{photo}, #{sitter_accept}, #{petsitter_email} )
